primary.context: Caller wanted to know how much they still owe on their mortgage
primary.detail: Agent successfully looked up the account and provided the mortgage balance and next due date.

secondary.context: Caller lost access to RCI and wanted to know why and how to fix it
secondary.detail: Agent explained the inactive status and provided the RCI website for reactivation.

steps: Agent performed account lookup and verified name.
Agent provided mortgage balance, monthly payment amount, and next due date.
Caller inquired about RCI access issues.
Agent identified inactive status and provided RCI contact information for renewal.
Caller confirmed they had no further questions.

actions.detail: Located account for Paul B. Moses at Berkshire Mountain Lodge
Provided mortgage balance and payment details verbally
Provided RCI website address for membership renewal

insights.summary: The caller successfully retrieved their mortgage balance and received instructions on how to reactivate their RCI membership.
insights.verbatim: Questions about how much I still owe on my mortgage.
